argumentText:
ARGUMENT

| Step | Hyp | Ref | Expression |
|---|---|---|---|

| 1 |  | #P_ax6e | |- E. x x = y |
\
 Axiom of existence (intuitionistic logic axiom ax-i9).  In classical logic, this is equivalent to ~ ax-6 but in intuitionistic logic it needs to be stated using the existential quantifier.  (Contributed by Jim Kingdon, 31-Dec-2017.)  (New usage is discouraged.)
